intro: Bauchea karwinskyi, commonly known as the Karwinsky's bauchea, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of central and southern Africa. Bauchea karwinskyi is adapted to survive in dry conditions, with a deep root system that helps it access water from deeper soil layers.
